links.title: Apple Stock (AAPL) Update: 3 Drives To A High? - See It Market
links.description: James Bartelloni shares an update chart and analysis of Apple stock (AAPL) and highlights why Apple may be forming a top. He points to several technical techniques that are offering formidable resistance that could form a top for Apple stock around 180.

links.title: US releases proposed China tariff list
links.description: Read more about US releases proposed China tariff list on Business Standard. The Office of US Trade Representative (USTR) has published a proposed list of Chinese goods subject to additional 25 per cent tariffs amid strong opposition from China and US business groups.

links.title: Robinhood Dividend Growth Stock Portfolio Update - March 2018
links.description: I currently use Robinhood for my dividend growth portfolio. Building a dividend portfolio is easy through Robinhood brokerage as they offer commission-free trading on all stock purchases and sells. In addition, Robinhood now has commission-free options trading, which can be a great tool for risk mitigation.
